56fab8e9-74b0-460f-a497-80717c33a730.description: The earner of this badge has completed all requirements specified by the VSU Office of Distance Education/VSU Online to teach online courses at Virginia State University.
56fab8e9-74b0-460f-a497-80717c33a730.name: VSU Online Approved Instructor

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge has met the following criteria: 1) completed designated VSU Online training programs sponsored by Quality Matters, Online Learning Consortium, ACUE, or Strategic Education. 2) Obtained a VSU training exception by holding a training certification from an approved online instruction training program offered by another university/ professional organization or has extensive pre-COVID-19 online teaching experience.
